title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' or just returning a null result set, the data set returns the wrong result. The expected behavior is that the data set should not be affected by invalid filter expressions. Currently, even the first result record returned during the preview is incorrect.
OB: During the preview of the data set, the first result record returned is incorrect.
EB: The first result record returned during the preview should match the expected behavior.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected Result: The first result record returned during the preview should match the expected behavior.
